stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance nbn cards in your deck. Name a card. The Runner reveals his or her grip and trashes all copies of the named card from his or her grip.
text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. Name a card. The Runner reveals his or her grip and trashes all copies of the named card from his or her grip.
title: Salem's Hospitality
